mapper.select: SELECT rtpfd.id, rtpfd.relation_id as relationId, rtpfd.company_office_id as companyOfficeId, rtpfd.post_id as postId, rtpfd.work_place as workPlace, rtpfd.operation_and_maintenance as operationAndMaintenance, rtpfd.productive_heat_source as productiveHeatSource, rtpfd.temperature_protection_facilities as temperatureProtectionFacilities, sco.`office_name` AS companyOfficeName FROM `record_temperature_protection_facilities_data` rtpfd, sys_company_office sco WHERE rtpfd.`company_office_id` = sco.`id` AND rtpfd.`relation_id` = #{id, jdbcType=BIGINT}
